Humanoid Robot.text:
WHAT: Figure's product is a humanoid robot designed to perform corporate tasks in areas with significant labor shortages and jobs that are undesirable or unsafe. 
CATEGORY: Humanoid robots. 
FEATURES: Capable of performing corporate tasks, deployed into the workforce, built in the physical world. 
CAPABILITIES: Autonomous, humanoid, deployable on a global scale. 
STAGE: Not explicitly stated, but part of the long-term vision. 
LINKS: https://figure.ai/culture 
NOTE: The product is described as commercially viable and part of the mission to solve labor economic challenges.

company.text:
NAME: Figure 
CONTACT: Not explicitly provided.

INDUSTRIES: Not explicitly mentioned. 
CUSTOMERS: Corporations facing labor shortages or unsafe jobs. 
PARTNERS: Not explicitly mentioned.

NOTE: The company operates as a winning team in the trenches, collaborating in-person to push each other to high levels of performance.
